import classes from '../Cart/Cart.module.css'; import useInput from "../../hooks/use-Input"; export const FormRegister = (props) => { const { value: enteredLogin, isValid: loginValid, hasError: loginInputHasError, valueChangeHandler:loginChangeHandler, inputBlurHandler: loginBlurHandler, reset: resetLoginInput }= useInput((value) => value.trim() !== '') const { value: enteredEmail, isValid: enteredEmailIsValid, hasError: emailInputHasError, valueChangeHandler: emailChangeHandler, inputBlurHandler: emailBlurHandler, reset: resetEmailInput, } = useInput((value) => value.includes('@')); return ( <>
) }
